name: School (Echinops)
description:
Submission for the Weekly Game Jam 128, the theme was Camouflage.

Gameplay: Collect stars to advance to the next level, while trying stay undetected as long as you can.

Controls:

-W- to advance forward.

-A- and -D- to rotate.

Use your mouse on the HUE bar at the bottom of the screen to choose a color and camouflage.
